title: Chinese destroyer Lanzhou arrives in Sri Lanka
content: News Courtesy: China.org.cn Chinese missile destroyer Lanzhou arrived at Sri Lanka’s Colombo port on Tuesday for a five-day visit in the South Asian island country. The destroyer Lanzhou, just ending a five-month escort task in the Gulf of Aden and Somali waters, would attend the celebrations for the Sri Lankan navy’s 60th anniversary, which falls…
